input.sentences: cosplay event getting the younger kids involved .
a young spiderman sitting on a bench .
a man dressed up as batman scowling .

output.sentences: This Halloween, there was an event that kids could be involved in.
We saw spider man taking a kick break on the bench.
Batman was ready with his scowling face.
The kids enjoyed taking pictures on the props we set up.
